TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content: I cant find where other engineers have posted .Craft files so i dont know what orders have been completed. We need to create a Voyager mediafire account and we upload every .crft on that. We will label the uploads with the username of the customer and the type of ship. Also if im not build orders on multiplayer i can use any mods the customer wants?

could I join I have expertise in quick takeoff aircraft aka hybrid vtol tech of which I have made 5 and heavy aircraft

Edited September 9, 2012 by kerbalgamer
adding extra bit
Guys whoever wanted to join please send me a PM, I will update the list today.
um i got a problem im runing a mac . the requirement is a pc. so i can't join the sever
Whats your thought on a mediafire for .Craft storage?
i cant do mediafire my k9 alert wont let me it would block it. are you saying if i post it you tranfer the data...IT JUST MIGHT WORK
k9 alert? Just an account that we lable each ship with customers name and type of ship so it is easier to keep track of whos order has been completed.

Guys, you can just attack the .craft in a text post right here on the forums. You don't need to bother with a mediafire or any other external site or anything. Just go into the advanced text editor and click on the little button that adds attachments.
no but how do we know which orders have been completed. We need a better system.
the sytem we have is though mess though we can live with it
well I have pm`ed the person I needed to so do you want a .craft file or something
Just learned my parents are divorcing so I Prob will loase my Laptop, Message me and can you give me a way to contact you if you are in the VL.
Im Very depressed, the Plooto III is giving me problems and this picture looks VERY familiar, I honor these Three Kerbals AND The Seven Looking down.
thats sad losing a dad/mom its gonna be hard
From what I hear I got a month, I Still get to see my dad on the weekends though so nothing really changed, I barely got to see him any ways.
thats so sad I am really sorry for you
Updated the board, Now lets get back to the Voyager Labs Board instead of my lifes problems that I cant do anything about.
The Plooto IV May be the new Plooto III, The Plooto III is being stuborn with Vibration issues As seen in the picture above...

Welcome to the Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space administration page, We are accepting orders for Stock and Probodyne rockets and sattelites. Our main goal is to explore the known and unknown universe of the kerbals.

---------Our second goal is Launching Private and Voyager Labs cargos, Kerbonauts, Sattelites, And Rovers. Our main Launch Vehicle is the Plooto I.

The Plooto I is the Most versatile and innovational Design of Voyager Labs. It is responsible for delivering kerbals and cargo to orbit. The largest payload's it has carried is a small space station and the Munar booster stage to the Munar Link Munar orbiter. Its first Manned launch will be the KTO (Kerbin To Orbit) 1. There are Two variants of the Plooto I:

Keep posted for news on launches.

The Plooto II is the "Just In" Project and is just being Declassified, Not much is known but this picture.

Under Heavy Development and most likely a failed project.

I am requesting a small space station with air for 6 months and has solar panels that recharge the air levels when it passes around Minmus. Mods to use: Any. Recommened Mods but not requiered; BACE,MMI sattilite,EPI
Im ready for an order everyone! PM me!!
You don't need to be PM'ed for an order. People just leave them on the board here. Speaking of which there's one on the previous page. Go for it.
